name: This Game Has No Name Yet
name_original: This Game Has No Name Yet
description:
Developer of this game abondened his work. A player avatar found himself in the solitude of the game world. Help him to build this game world and finish what developer started.

This game made for the Blackthornprod GAME JAM # 1 (#BTPGameJam)

You can move with A,D keys and jump with W. For interacting with things use E key.

If you run out of hearths you can rest in the bed (At the left of the base) and play a mini game
